card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it gains trample until end of turn. Equip {3}

card.name: Natural Hierarchy
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If excess damage is dealt, create an X/X green Dinosaur creature token, where X is the excess damage dealt.

card.name: Cherished Honeycomb
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance. Equip {2}{G}

card.name: Ancient Recollection
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or {C}. Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Discovery of Technique
card.text: {BR}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Craft a tool. (Create either an artifact token with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}" or an Equipment token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}.) Whenever you create a token, Discovery of Technique deals 1 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Acuno Tracker
card.text: Resilience (This creature can't block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a vigilance counter on it.) Other attacking creatures you control with vigilance get +1/+1.

card.name: Tribal Chronicler
card.text: Whenever an artifact or creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn — • Scry 2. • Draw a card.

card.name: Kuzam Champion
card.text: Equipped creatures you control have haste and trample. Whenever Kuzam Champion deals combat damage to an opponent, craft a tool. (Create either an artifact token with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}" or an Equipment token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}.)

card.name: Hunt-Song Warchief
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, as long as there are four or more card types among permanents you control, you may have target creature get +2/+2 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Tundra Sovereign
card.text: Lifelink, deathtouch Trophy {3}{W}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.) Enchanted creatures you control have lifelink and deathtouch.

card.name: Ferocious Raptor
card.text: Menace When Ferocious Raptor deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Then discard a card unless you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Cunning Exemplar
card.text: Other Hunters you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

card.name: Hunting Camp
card.text: When Hunting Camp enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Wolf creature token. Creatures you control with base power 2 or less get +1/+0.

card.name: Stone Scavenger
card.text: When Stone Scavenger dies, add {C}. Resilience (This creature can't block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a vigilance counter on it.)

card.name: Igneous Sabertooth
card.text: When Igneous Sabertooth dies, craft a tool. (Create either an artifact token with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}" or an Equipment token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}.)

card.name: Wandering Granite
card.text: When Wandering Granite enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards in a single graveyard. If {C}{C} was spent to cast Wandering Granite, instead exile all cards in that graveyard.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} or one mana of any color.

card.name: Soul of Fire

card.name: Scoured Bluffs

card.name: Intrusive Intent
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Elder Storyteller
card.text: Vigilance {GU}, {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: SSF Draft Archetypes SSF
card.text: {W}{U} RESILIENCE Young warriors attack early before returning to guard the tribe. {U}{B} SACRIFICE Life is harsh. Survive where others don't. {B}{R} TOOLCRAFT Show your strength by creating a steady stream of tokens. {R}{G} EQUIPMENT Sharpen your tools for the hunt and bring down your foe. {G}{W} CARD TYPES Gather cards of many types to broaden your options. {W}{B} AURAS Great beasts are hunted for their hides, their tusks, and your victory. {B}{G} HUNTERS The many hands of your Hunter creatures bring down large prey. {G}{U} COLORLESS Ancient tools and tribal magic power your spells. {U}{R} FEROCIOUS Might makes right with creatures with power 4 or greater. {R}{W} WEENIES Base power 2 or less is no obstacle when you works together.

card.name: Stubborn Denial
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell instead.

card.name: Quernstone
card.text: {X}, {T}: Target player mills X cards. If at least five {C} was spent to activate this ability, instead that player mills twice X cards.

card.name: Discovery of Fire
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Resourceful Savage
card.text: Whenever you cast an Aura spell or whenever an enchanted creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Qirauz, Architect of Worlds
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. [+1]: Draw a card. Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. [-X]: Put an artifact or creature card from your hand with mana value X or less onto the battlefield.

card.name: Glaciation
card.text: Destroy all artifacts and creatures.

card.name: World in Shadow
card.text: Exile target nonland, nonartifact permanent an opponent controls. You lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Embers of Hope
card.text: Search your library for a green creature or planeswalker card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 or loyalty counters on it, then shuffle.

card.name: Dreams of the Hunter
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Aura you control. Create X 1/1 white Wolf creature tokens.

card.name: Raukell, the Neolith
card.text: [+1]: Craft a tool. [0]: Raukell, the Neolith deals damage to target creature equal to the number of loyalty counters on her. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Raukell. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Artifacts and creatures you control have indestructible."

card.name: Amnia, Shaper of Stone
card.text: When Amnia, Shaper of Stone enters the battlefield, craft a tool. (Create either an artifact token with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}" or an Equipment token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}.) If an effect would create one or more artifact tokens under your control, it creates three times that many of those tokens instead.

card.name: Tranquil Expanse
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a lure counter on Tranquil Expanse, then you may put a nonland permanent card with mana value equal to or less than the number of lure counters on Tranquil Expanse from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Koware, Lanoa Chieftan
card.text: If an opponent would create one or more tokens, instead you and that player each create half that many of those tokens, rounded up.

card.name: Sturdy Pangolin
card.text: Sturdy Pangolin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When it does, if at least {C}{C}{C} was spent to cast it, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

card.name: Dawn of Time
card.text: Each player chooses up to three lands they control, then shuffles their hand, graveyard, and all other permanents they control into their library, then draws seven cards and crafts two tools. Exile Dawn of Time.

card.name: Charnel Hut
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B}. Activate only if you control a Mountain. {T}: Add {R}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Towering Oaks
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R}. Activate only if you control a Forest. {T}: Add {G}. Activate only if you control a Mountain.

card.name: Boreal Settlement

card.name: Nimbus Maze
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W}. Activate only if you control an Island. {T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control a Plains.

card.name: Treacherous Floe
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control a Swamp. {T}: Add {B}. Activate only if you control an Island.

card.name: Gird for Combat
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if {C} was spent to cast this spell. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Accursed Bloodpainter
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell during your turn, put a blood counter on Accursed Bloodpainter. Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one for each blood counter on Accursed Bloodpainter.

card.name: The Wrong Cave
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with base power 2 or less dies, put a prey counter on The Wrong Cave. As long as The Wrong Cave has three or more prey counters on it, it's a 5/5 Dragon creature with flying.

card.name: Raukell of the Amatar
card.text: When Raukell of the Amatar enters the battlefield, craft a tool. (Create either an artifact token with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}" or an Equipment token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}.) {B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a token: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Ancient Ice
card.text: When Ancient Ice dies, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Domestication of the Beast
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 4 or less from among them or your hand onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: The First Relic
card.text: Permanents being put into a graveyard from the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: Ancestor's Wisdom
card.text: Each player draws a card, then you draw an additional X cards, where X is the total number of cards drawn by players this turn.

card.name: Ruthless Skinner
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Craft a tool. (Create either an artifact token with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}" or an Equipment token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}.) {1}, Sacrifice two artifacts and/or creatures: Draw a card.

card.name: Strip Clean
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. Strip Clean deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Keystone Predator
card.text: Whenever Keystone Predator or enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, create a 1/1 white Wolf creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on up to one creature. Trophy {3}{W} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)

card.name: Young Chief
card.text: {C}: Young Chief becomes a Human Hunter with base power and toughness 2/2. {C}{C}: If Young Chief is a Hunter, put a vigilance counter on it and it becomes a Human Hunter Artificer with base power and toughness 4/4. {C}{C}{C}: If Young Chief is an Artificer, you may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Rising Smoke
card.text: Each opponent discards three cards. For each card fewer than three that an opponent discards this way, that player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

card.name: Magma Croaker
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Magma Croaker: Add {R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell. When you do, that spell can't be countered and gains "This spell deals 2 damage to any target."

card.name: Imperious Skywing
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Imperious Skywing attacks, you may pay {X}, where X is Imperious Skywing's power. If you do, return up to one target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield, then put a +1/+1 counter on Imperious Skywing.

card.name: Tyrant Wing
card.text: Flying Protection from colorless (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything colorless.) Creatures your opponents control without flying get -1/-0.

card.name: Encroaching Cold
card.text: This spell costs {B} more to cast during your first or second turns of the game. Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Crack the Ice
card.text: Choose one or both — • Copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.) • Counter target spell.

card.name: Tale of the Great Beast
card.text: If you would create one or more tokens, you may put that many lore counters on Tale of the Great Beast instead. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Tale of the Great Beast. If you do, each opponent loses X life and you create an X/X black Demon Dinosaur creature token, where X is the number of lore counters on Tale of the Great Beast.

card.name: Evolve or Be Extinct
card.text: Sacrifice all permanents you control, then reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield tapped, then cast any number of spells revealed this way without paying their mana costs, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Ka Norov, the Ancient Way
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play lands from the top of your library. You may cast spells from the top of your library if you pay an additional {C} to cast them.

card.name: Survive the Ice
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Up to two target permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Rapacious Fledgling
card.text: Rapacious Fledgling or enchanted creature has flying and first strike as long as it's attacking. Trophy {4}{W} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)

card.name: Vestiges of Time
card.text: Vestiges of Time enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Players can't cast noncreature spells with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Vestiges of Time.

card.name: Ancient Predator

card.name: Hardy Survivalist

When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a vigilance counter on it.) As long as Hardy Survivalist has a vigilance counter on it, other creatures you control have resilience.

card.name: Bel-Bakar, Yanamo Elder
card.text: Hunters you control have lifelink and deathtouch. Whenever a non-Human creature dies, you may pay 4 life. If you do, create a 2/1 white Human Hunter creature token.

card.name: Dying Breed

card.name: Great Migration
card.text: Your life total becomes the total power of creatures you control.

card.name: Kuzam Bladecrafter
card.text: Equipment you control have equip {C}{C}.

card.name: Primitive Cultivation

card.name: Stalking Jaguar
card.text: Whenever Stalking Jaguar or enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, that player discards a card. If they can't, you draw a card. card.name: Purity of the Hunt
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Then those creatures fight each other.

card.name: Petrified Wilds
card.text: As Petrified Wilds enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Turn of the Season
card.text: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: Primitive Monolith
card.text: You may sacrifice two artifacts rather than pay this spell's mana cost. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Cursed Trophy

card.name: Frenzied Megatherium
card.text: Whenever Frenzied Megatherium is dealt combat damage, create a token that's a copy of it. {3}{G}: Frenzied Megatherium must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Glacier's End
card.text: Exile each creature. Return each creature you own exiled this way to the battlefield. For each other creature exiled this way, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of that player's next end step.

card.name: Basal Species
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Exile the top card of target player's library and up to one target card from that player's graveyard. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.

card.name: Broad-Crowned Stag
card.text: If a nontoken artifact or enchantment would be put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, exile that card instead. You may cast spells from among cards exiled with Broad-Crowned Stag, and you may spend mana from snow sources as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

card.name: Aeons Past
card.text: When a player casts a spell during another player's turn, sacrifice Aeons Past. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.

card.name: Weight of Ages
card.text: Destroy target permanent that's one or more colors.

card.name: Rugged Brontodon
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, exile Rugged Brontodon then return it to your hand. Trophy {1}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)

card.name: Hatching Season
card.text: If you would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, you may create an X/X green Dinosaur creature token instead, where X is the number of counters that would have been placed on that permanent.

card.name: Progress
card.text: When Progress enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent with mana value 4 or less that's one or more colors. Evoke—Exile a card from your hand with {C} in its mana cost. (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: Prehistory
card.text: When Prehistory enters the battlefield or attacks, exile target permanent or target card from a graveyard. Prehistory's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards exiled with it. Prehistory has protection from each card type among cards exiled with it.

card.name: Goliath Godwing
card.text: Flying, lifelink Tokens you create enter the battlefield as a copy of Goliath Godwing.

card.name: Deathless Gargantosaur
card.text: Deathless Gargantosaur costs an additional {X} to cast, where X is your life total.

card.name: Winter's Sovereign
card.text: Vigilance Winter's Sovereign has ward {1}{C} as long as it's untapped. Whenever Winter's Sovereign deals combat damage to an opponent, you may tap it and put a stun counter on it. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: Endless Caverns
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand or your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you cast a spell from your graveyard this way, exile it as it resolves.

card.name: Apex of the Wild
card.text: First strike, haste Whenever Apex of the Wild attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls with the greatest power.

card.name: Colossal Eruption
card.text: Until end of turn, if a red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead. Colossal Eruption deals 2 damage to each creature, planeswalker, and opponent.

card.name: Sturdy Glyptodon
card.text: Indestructible Trophy {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.) Enchanted creature has indestructible
